name: Cosmic Delights!
description:
It's another day at Cosmic Delights, spells and charms delivery service! 
Incantations, magical items, and flawless customer service! 

Evangeline the witch is available to take your call and create a custom spell or charm to suit your needs. She's assisted by an authentic forest spirit, who will carefully print your incantation on to parchment before it is mailed by express raven.

Satisfaction absolutely guaranteed!

Credits:

Cesca - writing, programming, & animations
Ori- character designs & 2D art
Cam - programming & item descriptions
Ali - programming & animations
with music by ReverbInTheVoid!

Created for the Wholesome Games Jam 2020!

Greatly inspired by ALBinWhisperland's video "Call the Magic Hotline"
